sections.heading: district, defined.Tax district means an area within a county in which all of the taxable property is subject to property taxes at the same consolidated property tax rate

sections.text:
77-127.Tax district, defined.

Tax district means an area within a county in which all of the taxable property is subject to property taxes at the same consolidated property tax rate.

SourceLaws 1997, LB 270, ยง 10.
